entries.title: Ths Shifting Landscape of Design
entries.description: The design industry is in a state of flux. The landscape is shifting, and the role of the designer is evolving. The days of the designer as a pixel pusher are long gone. The designer of today is a strategic thinker, a problem solver, and a storyteller. The designer of today is a leader, a collaborator, and a change agent. The designer of today is a business person, a technologist, and a futurist.

entries.title: The Importance of Baselines
entries.description: Baselines provide a stable and known starting point for comparison during software development and testing. By comparing changes or new versions against the baseline, discrepancies, bugs, or regressions can be easily identified, ensuring software quality and reliability throughout its development life cycle.

entries.title: The Future-Proof Toolkit for Front-end Design
entries.description: Currently knee-deep in the sea of design tools, much like we've always been, we realize that the current industry standard file format is just a pitstop on the journey – a tool bound to be succeeded by something else down the line. It's a matter of time before we navigate a new terrain, and design tools become a stepping stone in the ongoing design evolution.

entries.title: Embracing Design QA
entries.description: In our pursuit of perfection, we've introduced Design Quality Assurance (DQA) at our company. This isn't just a change in terminology—it's a fundamental shift in how we approach the bridge between design and development. So, why the new focus? DQA is about more than catching bugs; it's about ensuring our designs not only look good but function beautifully right from the start.

entries.title: CSS Configuration Starter
entries.description: This CSS starter configuration is designed to provide a comprehensive scaffolding for styling a website. It includes a robust set of variables for colors, typography, spacing, and more, allowing for extensive customization. The configuration supports both light and dark themes and is structured to be easily adaptable to various design needs.

entries.title: Dynamic Text Component
entries.description: The `DynamicText` component is a flexible Vue component designed to render text as plain text or HTML. It dynamically determines the rendering mode based on a Boolean prop. Below, you'll find usage examples for Vue, plain HTML, and React.
